name: Kreton La Resistance
storyline:
Since Blubb showed us the hammer trick, we somehow ended up in the 19th century.
Funnily enough, in a prison in Paris. After a while, he disappeared after he hit the hammer again. There must be something wrong with his hammer. Anyway, it was just the three of us.
Me, Jean Paul, and Kretti.
We have to find a way back to our times at any cost.
summary: Save the Moles from prison and escape from the 19th century!
